short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access your sales information from your CRM easily across any website to help you easily identify your best leads, and save time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super Stone upgrades your sales workflows to help you identify your best leads first. 

You can see all your CRM and any internal data across any webpage to help you identify if a new company you come across is worth your time chasing.

You can easily see if they're already a current customer, or are already in your sales pipeline too so that you can avoid chasing irrelevant prospects.
